name: Jumping Bryan - A mildly infuriating Platformer
name_original: Jumping Bryan - A mildly infuriating Platformer
description:
Jumping Bryan is a Jumping King like 2D Precision-Platformer game that has a unique twist.


  • You are jumping non-stop
  • There are multiple kinds of obstacles
  • Good for speedrunning and content creation
  • Fluid animations!
  • Fun main menu soundtrack

Bryan, among thousands of people is unfortunately infected by the virus known as the Jumping Virus.  It is believed that the evil scientist Dr. Azeron is the sole creator of this so called virus. Rumors quickly spread that the cure for this tiring illness is at the top of his tower. 

What is known about  Azeron's Tower?

Many have tried to jump into the quest of finding the so called cure, but many all found themselves in a pickle when they found out that this tower contains obstacles that lead them to their demise. 

Currently, Leguara Games is composed of a one man development team from the Philippines lead by Paul Legaspi. It is our dream to one day publish a game on steam, hence why we are publishing this game on itch.io to hopefully raise funds in order to afford the $100 License fee for developer access.
